vegawidget 0.0.3

  • Changelog

Coerce vegaspec to JSON

Source: R/vegaspec.R
vw_as_json.Rd

For Vega and Vega-Lite, the translation between list and JSON is a little bit particular. This function, vw_as_json(), can be used to translate to JSON; as_vegaspec() can be used to translate from JSON.

vw_as_json(spec, pretty = TRUE)

Arguments

spec

object to be coerced to vegaspec, a Vega/Vega-Lite specification
pretty

logical indicates to use pretty (vs. minified) formatting

Value

jsonlite::json object

See also

as_vegaspec()

Examples

  vw_as_json(spec_mtcars)
#> {
#>   "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v2.json",
#>   "width": 300,
#>   "height": 300,
#>   "description": "An mtcars example.",
